Some political turmoil was going on earlier this year at the NBTHK and my u=
nderstand is that this caused people to spin their wheels, shall I say. Mr.=
 Tanobe told us in October that all of this has been resolved and things ar=
e moving ahead once again. I've no clue if this has delayed shinsa results =
although I suspect it has. Early in last year several swords sent over did =
take a longer than usual time to clear shinsa. At that time, according to w=
hat Tanobe san told me, they were simply hit with an unusually large number=
 of shinsa submissions. I suspect it has been a combination of such things =
that my have slowed things down a bit. Hopefully 2007 will see things back =
into a more normal mode for them. 

Ron
STL
